channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Missed recycling collection and fly tipping litter dropping, 20th December
item.description:
Uncollected green bin bags, Can this be sorted today please! People keep dropping litter on top of the bin bags and it’s creating a big mess

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwood Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and wet cardboard on the pavement., 20th December
item.description:
Litter and cardboard box on the pavement, and wet slippery leaves
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Pennethorne Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human Faeces yet again, 20th December
item.description:
At the end of Clapton passage, down the alley to the access of flats 119 Lower Clapton Road. Another human faeces has been left there. This is the second time in 2 weeks and it took almost a week to clean up last time.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lower Clapton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 20th December
item.description:
Black bags and rubbish outside Community Hospice Pickford Lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Pickford Lane, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Each night, people are dumping rubbish here outside 4 and 5 Graduate place, 20th December
item.description:
There has been an ongoing fly tipping problem here for weeks with people filling out bins with black bags or dumping them by the bins. Now they are pulling out the bins to dump large waste behind them and in the last two nights, have left a table and now further large boxes. Every night they dump more.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wild's Rents, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter all over the streets around here, 20th December
item.description:
Dumped polystyrene all over the place. All the streets nearby need sweeping as there is litter everywhere.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dropped Manhole Cover at entrance to Sainsburys, 20th December
item.description:
As you enter Sainsburys Northbound from New Cross Road there is a dropped manhole cover. This is adjacent to petrol station and entrance to TK Maxx car park. Manhole cover is dropped and crumbling away, unsafe to drive over
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Cross Road, New Cross Gate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All the lights are not working in the car park, 20th December
item.description:
All the lights have been out for a few weeks making it incredibly dark It's all the lampposts in galleons close At night it's hard to see the kerbs and people could fall and hurt themselves There is also a lot of vehicles parked there making them vulnerable to theft
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Galleon Close, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox, 20th December

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenoaks Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Huge dog poo on my doorstep, 20th December
item.description:
It’s been stepped on so is spread across the pavement outside our front door: i’m having to lift my 4 year old over it. i’ve tried to wash it away but it’s too big. This is happening up Chatsworth Road a lot recently.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooksbys Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Victoria Way, Charlton

item.title: Forest blocking pavement and step down kerb. Vicarage Grove, 20th December
item.description:
This has been reoccurring this week. Please ask your selfish customers to park with thought and sensitivity for example by leaving their Lime / forest bike across the road where there is plenty of space to park without compromising pedestrians . This has been happening for years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vicarage Grove, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 20th December
item.description:
Flytipping of umbrella and other things. Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): William Barefoot Drive, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Access issue - drop down curb required, 20th December
item.description:
Can a drop down curb be installed here, between footpath from the main roundabout footpath to next to where cafe has chairs with barriers to prevent cars parking there? Cannot traverse whilst in wheelchair, is dangerous as because of high curb wheelchair users are forced tpcross via entrance to side access road, cars park there blocking access, cars reverse out. The drop down curb already there forces pedestrians to walk behind parked cars. Wheelchair users are more vulnerable, drivers cut across or reverse out. Access needs to be made wheelchair friendly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stone Park Avenue, Eden Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
